name: 达伦·克鲁兹
introduction: Darren Cruz is a Southern California native. Born in Ventura County, Darren grew up in the Rancho Peñasquitos neighborhood in San Diego, California and graduated from Mt. Carmel High School. He obtained his Bachelor of Arts in psychology from San Diego State University and thereafter received his Juris Doctor from Temple University, Beasley School of Law in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania. He is a licensed attorney in the State of California. He studies at the Los Angeles Acting Studio SD.
